channel.title: HELP! Thread per client removal errors!
channel.description:
Sorry for double topic post but this is [i][b]URGENT[/b][/i] I imported the classes but now i have one error left from Graham's Remove-thread-per-client tutorial.
[code]IOClient.java:179: error: cannot find symbol PlayerSave loadgame = loadGame(playerNa e, playerPass); ^ symbol: method loadGame(String,String) location: class IOClient Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
Please help, i know i just broke the rules but give me a citation for it later, right now i really need help with my server, please i beg u.

item.title: HELP! Thread per client removal errors!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Nothing is so urgent that you need to make multiple threads, especially when the cause of the problem is clearly stated in the compiler error.

Read full topic
item.source: HELP! Thread per client removal errors!

item.title: HELP! Thread per client removal errors!
item.dc:creator: @weeddamn weeddamn
item.description:
@weeddamn wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:2, topic:443433”][quote author=weeddamn link=topic=546120.msg4003418#msg4003418 date=1338333264]
Sorry for double topic post but this is URGENT I imported the classes but now i have one error left from Graham’s Remove-thread-per-client tutorial.

IOClient.java:179: error: cannot find symbol PlayerSave loadgame = loadGame(playerNa e, playerPass); ^ symbol: method loadGame(String,String) location: class IOClient Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Please help, i know i just broke the rules but give me a citation for it later, right now i really need help with my server, please i beg u.
[/quote]
Don’t make multiple help threads.[/quote]

Ok i know man but i just need help with this one error! and then ill be Warned by a mod ok. I just really need help alright im sorry

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! Thread per client removal errors!
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

eyeownyew:

Don’t make multiple help threads.

weeddamn:

Sorry for double topic post but this is URGENT

He said it’s pretty urgent and apologized for his inconvenience it would of helped him if you ‘helped’ him instead of just say something he already knows. It’s really annoying when people do this because I’ve been in this situation.

Read full topic
